site.title: Bonaire Patacona Apartment
site.subtitle: Beach · Pool · Wi-Fi · Terrace · A/C · Parking

hero.title: Seaside apartment at La Patacona — terrace & steps to the beach
hero.description: Enjoy this cozy apartment in a family-friendly complex. Perfect for couples and small families — terrace, high-speed Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchen.

terrace.title: Terrace
terrace.description: South-facing terrace with outdoor furniture, perfect for relaxing after a day at the beach or exploring the city.

location.title: Location
location.description: Located in La Patacona, just one street from the beach and 15 minutes from Valencia city center by direct bus. Enjoy nearby restaurants, bars and activities.

beach.title: Beach
beach.description: Very close to La Patacona beach, known for its fine sand and calm waters. Perfect for families and water activities.

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Large pool and kids pool with lifeguard, perfect for a refreshing swim. Kids playground and grassy relaxation area.

padel.title: Padel
padel.description: Padel courts available for guests. Enjoy a match in a pleasant and sporty environment.

kids.title: Kids
kids.description: Private kids playground within the complex, ideal for little ones to have fun in a safe environment.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Free high-speed Wi-Fi connection throughout the apartment, perfect for working or enjoying online content.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Private garage parking included, with direct access to the apartment.

about.title: About this space
about.desc: Sunny south-facing apartment with two bedrooms (1 double + 2 single beds), one full bathroom with bathtub and hydro column, living room with TV and Chromecast, and fully equipped kitchen. Terrace with seating. Close to beach and local restaurants.

common.location: One street from the beach. 15 min to Valencia city center by direct bus.
common.poolSeason: Pool with lifeguard: June–September 10:30–15:30 & 16:30–22:00 (other dates on request).
common.checkLaw: By Spanish law (Real Decreto 933/2021) personal data for all guests is requested at check-in.

reviews.title: Guest reviews
reviews.placeholder: This listing has 20 reviews and an average rating of 4.95.

testimonials.title: Guest reviews
testimonials.placeholder: This listing has 20 reviews on Airbnb and an average rating of 4.95
